messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4095
messages.msgSnippet: on 10/8/03 7:33 PM, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com at ... David Alpert has a wonderful chapter about just this in his new book. My son is also
messages.messageBody:
on 10/8/03 7:33 PM, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com at
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Do kids at this age change their mind about
> their future career? He's so full of changes lately and while all of them have
> been wonderful to see him grow through, I'm having a hard time keeping up!

David Alpert has a wonderful chapter about just this in his new book.

My son is also interested in photography and animals. We got him a great
digital camera for his birthday. I like digital for new photographers
because they can take so many pictures, download them, and check them out
without the expense of developing them.

Paula
